Rainy_Day_0: I sometimes find inspiration in the most unlikely of places.
Rainy_Day_1: I used to find rain depressing when I lived in the city. But here in Stardew Valley it's beautiful.
Rainy_Day_2: Good morning! I got up early and did some mushroom hunting. Here, take one.[281 404 420 257]#$e#Searching for mushrooms is like going on a treasure hunt. It's a lot of fun.$h
Rainy_Day_3: It's days like this I'm really happy about my heavy-duty boots.$h
Rainy_Day_4: The trees have been begging for this rain... I'm happy for them.
Rainy_Night_0: How was your day? Did you see any animals out there?
patio_Leah: Don't look too close, it's a work in progress.
Rainy_Night_1: I usually go for salad... but a wet night like this gives me cravings for hot soup.$h
Rainy_Night_2: It's going to be relaxing to fall asleep on a night like this...$l
Rainy_Night_3: I made a little wood sculpture today, but it was so ugly I threw it into the fire.$u#$e#I think to become a great artist, you have to be critical of your own work.
Rainy_Night_4: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to get under the covers and stay warm.
Rainy_Night_Leah: How was your day today, dear? Muddy?
Indoor_Day_0: This house is a lot nicer than my old cabin! I don't miss it.
Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @. I've planted these in a little pot out back... [16 18 20 22 90 259 396 402]#$e#I grew that with great love and attention. Enjoy it.
Indoor_Day_2: Always remember to keep your eyes peeled for wild food! There's lots out there.
Indoor_Day_3: I was thinking... life's too short to eat bad food. Luckily, we live in one of the best regions for fresh greens and vegetables!#$e#Here, I made you a healthy salad. [196]#$e#I'm surprised you aren't sick of my salad yet!
Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, @! I made us some coffee.[395]$h#$e#My morning just wouldn't be complete without a hot cup of coffee.
Indoor_Night_0: Something about this time of night makes me thirsty.
Indoor_Night_1: The flow of time is so delicate... even the tiniest decision changes the future forever.
Indoor_Night_2: It's so much lovelier here at night than the garish glow of the city.#$e#Everything worked out perfectly for me. I'm very lucky.
Indoor_Night_3: I never thought I'd receive a mermaid's pendant so soon after moving here! I'm happy about it, though.$l
Indoor_Night_4: I saw a wild rabbit today. I just wish I could pet one someday. They look so soft...
Outdoor_0: The cool breeze feels nice. It reminds me of living by the river.
Outdoor_1: Hmm... I'm going to do some maintenance over here. I just get the urge to do some hammering now and then.
Outdoor_2: It's going to be a special day, I can sense it.
Outdoor_3: Ah... that smell of fresh dirt. There's nothing quite like it.$h#$e#You can just tell the air is clean here... it feels good in the lungs.
Outdoor_4: Don't overwork yourself, dear.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h
funLeave_Leah: I'm going to take a nature walk today. I need to get out of the house.
funReturn_Leah: I had a nice, relaxing time today. How did your day go?
OneKid_3: It's fun to be a parent. I want to make sure %kid1 grows up to have a love for the outdoors.
TwoKids_3: We've got a wonderful farm and a full family. Our new life has really turned out well, hasn't it?
Good_0: Living here, I feel like I'm on the summit of a great mountain.
Good_1: Did I ever tell you... when you first moved here I had a dream that we'd be together someday.
Good_2: Sometimes it's hard not to believe in destiny... the fact that I decided to move here, and that we found each other.#$b#It could've gone entirely differently at any point.
Good_3: Wow, you look full of energy today!$l^You look beautiful today.$l
Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... I'll cherish this treasure for the rest of my life.$l
Good_6: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
Good_7: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h
Good_8: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!$l
Good_9: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.#$e#It's a simple life, but I like it.$h
Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.
Neutral_1: I wonder who lived here before us?
Neutral_2: Don't you have anything to do today?
Neutral_3: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Neutral_4: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money, @?
Neutral_6: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
Neutral_7: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Neutral_8: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms can be kind of dirty.
Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
Bad_1: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.$s
Bad_2: Are you still happy with me?s
Bad_3: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.$s
Bad_4: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?$s
Bad_5: You used to be romantic... what happened?$s#$e#I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?$a
Bad_6: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?$s
Bad_7: I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.$s
Bad_8: You've been so cold to me lately...$s
Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better.$s
spring_2: So, what are we planting this season?
spring_1: That was some way to ring in the new year last night...$l
spring_15: *sigh*... I guess it's time for the 'spring cleaning' again.$s
summer_1: Ah, summer... I can smell the spice berries already.$h
summer_9: Sorry if I'm wet to the touch... I was sweating all night in the heat.
summer_2: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them.
fall_1: I love fall for the mushroom hunting opportunities. It comes and goes pretty fast.
fall_20: Have you planned for winter at all? It's good to have a stockpile of hay.
fall_2: I know harvest season is a busy time for you. I'll try and help out as much as I can.
winter_1: Winter's here, and that means crystal fruit is in season. It has such a unique flavor, don't you think?
winter_7: I'm looking forward to carving ice sculptures tomorrow. I only get to do it once a year, but it's a lot of fun!
winter_28: Hey, here's to another great year at %farm farm! Let's have some fun tonight! [348]$h#$e#Next year is going to be great, I can feel it.
